function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Severe illness, hospitalization, and potential death","Mitigation":"Vaccination, mask-wearing, social distancing","Technologies":"Vaccines, testing kits, air filtration systems","People":"General population","Owner":"Health authorities"},{"Description":"Extended lockdowns","Impact":"Mental health issues, economic hardship","Mitigation":"Support services, financial assistance, gradual reopening plans","Technologies":"Mental health apps, financial aid platforms","People":"General population, policymakers","Owner":"Government, mental health organizations"},{"Description":"School and university lectures moving online","Impact":"Disruption of traditional education, increased screen time","Mitigation":"Hybrid learning models, screen time management tools","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, educational apps","People":"Students, educators","Owner":"Education institutions, technology companies"}]}
